admission_text:
Membership2025-10-06T14:07:53-04:00

## Membership

A Heritage Museums & Gardens membership is more than unlimited visits, early garden access, and special events—it’s your key to a place of discovery, play, and connection. With just two visits, your membership pays for itself!

But your support means even more to us. Membership is the heart of Heritage, helping us care for these beautiful grounds, engage visitors of all ages, and continue our mission. Your involvement keeps Heritage thriving!

**Please note:** Memberships are non-transferable and non-refundable.

[JOIN OR RENEW](http://web.archive.org/web/20251007101021/https://hmg.ticketapp.org/portal/pages/membership "Become a member")

[LEVELS & BENEFITS](http://web.archive.org/web/20251007101021/https://heritagemuseumsandgardens.org/join-and-give/membership-details/ "Become a member")

[MEMBER LOGIN](http://web.archive.org/web/20251007101021/https://hmg.ticketapp.org/portal/auth "Become a member")

### [Member Frequently Asked Questions](http://web.archive.org/web/20251007101021/https://heritagemuseumsandgardens.org/membership-faq/)

accessibility_text:
Ensuring Accessibility at Heritage Museums & Gardens2024-08-07T16:16:21-04:00

Heritage strives to be accessible to visitors of all ages and abilities.

Please see the list below for the ways in which Heritage provides access to visitors. For additional access information please call our admission staff at 508-888-3300 ext. 0 or email us at [info@heritagemuseums.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20260101034733/mailto:info@heritagemuseums.org)

### 

### Parking/Entrance

_Parking_

Accessible spaces are available. There are spaces reserved for handicapped parking, which are clearly marked in our Elm Parking lot; the parking lot most closely adjacent to our entrance and admission booth.

Parking is free for museums patrons.

For directions, please visit our [directions and parking](http://web.archive.org/web/20260101034733/https://heritagemuseumsandgardens.org/about-us/visit/directions/) website.

_Entrance_

67 Grove Street is our current Main Entrance. We have two entrances to the parking lot on our property. The first entrance opens into an ellipse with a drop off area and access to the accessible parking in the Elm lot. If this entrance is closed, it is full for non-accessible patrons. Please let the parking attendants know you require assistance and they will direct you to into the Elm lot for accessible parking.

_Transportation_

Complimentary transportation for visitors with mobility challenges is available and can be accessed at seven fixed stops throughout the grounds ...

# Discover Heritage Museums & Gardens:

# Art, History, and Nature

## Become A Member

Becoming a member at Heritage connects you to a community of people who love to learn, explore, play and engage. As a member, you’ll have access to FREE unlimited admission, invitations to special events, early access to the gardens and more!

[JOin today!](http://web.archive.org/web/20260105170506/https://heritagemuseumsandgardens.org/join-and-give/membership/)

## 2025 Exhibits

The 1942 Willys MB Jeep: Celebrating the End of World War II

Celebrate the 80-year anniversary of the end of World War II by viewing Heritage’s newest automobile acquisition: the 1942 Willys MB Jeep. This brand-new exhibit explores the history of this iconic wartime vehicle, showcasing what US General George Marshall called “America’s greatest contribution to modern warfare.”

[LEARN MORE](http://web.archive.org/web/2...
